classes.name: DefaultTableModel
classes.description: An implementation of TableModel that uses a Vector of Vectors to store cell values. The most commonly used table model in Ignition Vision scripts for Power Table customization.

constructors.description: Constructs a default DefaultTableModel which is a table of zero columns and zero rows.

params.name: rowCount
params.description: The number of rows the table holds

params.name: columnCount
params.description: The number of columns the table holds

constructors.description: Constructs a DefaultTableModel with the specified number of rows and columns of null values.

params.name: columnNames
params.description: Array of column names

params.name: rowCount
params.description: The number of rows the table holds

constructors.description: Constructs a DefaultTableModel with as many columns as there are elements in columnNames and the specified number of rows.

params.name: data
params.description: The data of the table, a 2D array of Objects

params.name: columnNames
params.description: The names of the columns

constructors.description: Constructs a DefaultTableModel and initializes the table by passing data and columnNames.

methods.name: addRow

params.name: rowData
params.description: The data of the row being added

methods.description: Adds a row to the end of the model. The new row will contain null values unless rowData is specified.

methods.name: insertRow

params.name: row
params.description: The row index of the row to be inserted

params.name: rowData
params.description: The data of the row being inserted

methods.description: Inserts a row at the specified position in the model.

methods.name: removeRow

params.name: row
params.description: The row index of the row to be removed

methods.description: Removes the row at the specified index from the model.

methods.name: setValueAt

params.name: aValue
params.description: The new value

params.name: row
params.description: The row index

params.name: column
params.description: The column index

methods.description: Sets the object value for the cell at the specified row and column.

methods.name: getValueAt

params.name: row
params.description: The row index

params.name: column
params.description: The column index

returns.description: The value at the specified cell

methods.description: Returns the value for the cell at the specified row and column.

methods.name: getRowCount

returns.description: The number of rows in the model

methods.description: Returns the number of rows in this data table.

methods.name: getColumnCount

returns.description: The number of columns in the model

methods.description: Returns the number of columns in this data table.

methods.name: getColumnName

params.name: column
params.description: The column index

returns.description: The name of the column

methods.description: Returns the column name at the given column index.

methods.name: setColumnIdentifiers

params.name: newIdentifiers
params.description: Array of column identifiers. If null, column names are set to empty strings.

methods.description: Replaces the column identifiers in the model. If the number of new identifiers differs, the model is restructured accordingly.

methods.name: addColumn

params.name: columnName
params.description: The identifier of the column being added

methods.description: Adds a column to the model with null cell values.

methods.name: addColumn

params.name: columnName
params.description: The identifier of the column being added

params.name: columnData
params.description: The data of the column being added

methods.description: Adds a column to the model with the specified column data.

methods.name: setRowCount

params.name: rowCount
params.description: The new number of rows

methods.description: Sets the number of rows in the model. New rows are added with null values; excess rows are discarded.

methods.name: setNumRows

params.name: rowCount
params.description: The new number of rows

methods.description: Obsolete as of Java 2 platform v1.3. Please use setRowCount instead.

methods.name: moveRow

params.name: start
params.description: The starting row index to be moved

params.name: end
params.description: The ending row index to be moved

params.name: to
params.description: The destination of the rows to be moved

methods.description: Moves one or more rows from the inclusive range start to end to the to position in the model.

methods.name: getDataVector

returns.description: The Vector of Vectors containing the table's data values

methods.description: Returns the Vector of Vectors that contains the table's data values.

methods.name: isCellEditable

params.name: row
params.description: The row index

params.name: column
params.description: The column index

returns.description: True (all cells are editable by default)

methods.description: Returns true regardless of parameter values. All cells are editable by default in DefaultTableModel.

methods.name: setColumnCount

params.name: columnCount
params.description: The new number of columns in the model

methods.description: Sets the number of columns in the model. New columns are added with null column names and null cell values; excess columns are discarded.

methods.name: fireTableDataChanged
methods.description: Notifies all listeners that all cell values in the table's rows may have changed. Triggers a table repaint.

methods.name: fireTableRowsInserted

params.name: firstRow
params.description: The first row that was inserted

params.name: lastRow
params.description: The last row that was inserted

methods.description: Notifies all listeners that rows in the range [firstRow, lastRow] have been inserted.

methods.name: fireTableRowsDeleted

params.name: firstRow
params.description: The first row that was deleted

params.name: lastRow
params.description: The last row that was deleted

methods.description: Notifies all listeners that rows in the range [firstRow, lastRow] have been deleted.

methods.name: fireTableRowsUpdated

params.name: firstRow
params.description: The first row that was updated

params.name: lastRow
params.description: The last row that was updated

methods.description: Notifies all listeners that rows in the range [firstRow, lastRow] have been updated.

methods.name: fireTableCellUpdated

params.name: row
params.description: The row of the cell that was updated

params.name: column
params.description: The column of the cell that was updated

methods.description: Notifies all listeners that the value of the cell at [row, column] has been updated.

methods.name: fireTableStructureChanged
methods.description: Notifies all listeners that the table's structure has changed. The number of columns, column names, and column types may have all changed.

classes.name: AbstractTableModel
classes.description: An abstract implementation of the TableModel interface that provides default implementations for most methods. Subclass this to create custom table models for Ignition Vision Power Tables.

methods.name: getRowCount

returns.description: The number of rows in the model

methods.description: Returns the number of rows in the model. Must be implemented by subclasses.

methods.name: getColumnCount

returns.description: The number of columns in the model

methods.description: Returns the number of columns in the model. Must be implemented by subclasses.

methods.name: getValueAt

params.name: row
params.description: The row index

params.name: column
params.description: The column index

returns.description: The value at the specified cell

methods.description: Returns the value for the cell at the specified row and column. Must be implemented by subclasses.

methods.name: getColumnName

params.name: column
params.description: The column index

returns.description: The default name of the column

methods.description: Returns a default name for the column using spreadsheet conventions: A, B, C, ... Z, AA, AB, etc.

methods.name: getColumnClass

params.name: columnIndex
params.description: The column index

returns.description: The class of the column data (Object.class by default)

methods.description: Returns Object.class regardless of columnIndex. Override to return the appropriate class for the column's data type.

methods.name: isCellEditable

params.name: row
params.description: The row index

params.name: column
params.description: The column index

returns.description: False by default

methods.description: Returns false. Override to allow cell editing in specific rows and columns.

methods.name: setValueAt

params.name: aValue
params.description: The new value

params.name: row
params.description: The row index

params.name: column
params.description: The column index

methods.description: Empty implementation. Override to set the value at the specified cell and fire appropriate events.

methods.name: addTableModelListener

params.name: l
params.description: The TableModelListener to add

methods.description: Adds a listener to the list that is notified each time a change to the data model occurs.

methods.name: removeTableModelListener

params.name: l
params.description: The TableModelListener to remove

methods.description: Removes a listener from the list that is notified each time a change to the data model occurs.

methods.name: fireTableDataChanged
methods.description: Notifies all listeners that all cell values in the table's rows may have changed.

methods.name: fireTableStructureChanged
methods.description: Notifies all listeners that the table's structure has changed.

methods.name: fireTableRowsInserted

params.name: firstRow
params.description: The first row that was inserted

params.name: lastRow
params.description: The last row that was inserted

methods.description: Notifies all listeners that rows in the range [firstRow, lastRow] have been inserted.

methods.name: fireTableRowsDeleted

params.name: firstRow
params.description: The first row that was deleted

params.name: lastRow
params.description: The last row that was deleted

methods.description: Notifies all listeners that rows in the range [firstRow, lastRow] have been deleted.

methods.name: fireTableRowsUpdated

params.name: firstRow
params.description: The first row that was updated

params.name: lastRow
params.description: The last row that was updated

methods.description: Notifies all listeners that rows in the range [firstRow, lastRow] have been updated.

methods.name: fireTableCellUpdated

params.name: row
params.description: The row of the cell that was updated

params.name: column
params.description: The column of the cell that was updated

methods.description: Notifies all listeners that the value of the cell at [row, column] has been updated.

methods.name: findColumn

params.name: columnName
params.description: The name of the column to find

returns.description: The column index, or -1 if not found

methods.description: Returns the index of the column with the given name, or -1 if no column has that name.

classes.name: TableModel
classes.description: The interface that specifies the methods the JTable will use to interrogate a tabular data model. This is the base interface that all table models must implement.

methods.name: getRowCount

returns.description: The number of rows in the model

methods.description: Returns the number of rows in the model.

methods.name: getColumnCount

returns.description: The number of columns in the model

methods.description: Returns the number of columns in the model.

methods.name: getColumnName

params.name: columnIndex
params.description: The index of the column

returns.description: The name of the column

methods.description: Returns the name of the column at the given index.

methods.name: getColumnClass

params.name: columnIndex
params.description: The index of the column

returns.description: The class of the column data

methods.description: Returns the most specific superclass for all the cell values in the column. Used by the JTable to set up a default renderer and editor for the column.

methods.name: isCellEditable

params.name: rowIndex
params.description: The row index

params.name: columnIndex
params.description: The column index

returns.description: True if the cell is editable

methods.description: Returns true if the cell at the specified position is editable.

methods.name: getValueAt

params.name: rowIndex
params.description: The row index

params.name: columnIndex
params.description: The column index

returns.description: The value at the specified cell

methods.description: Returns the value for the cell at the specified position.

methods.name: setValueAt

params.name: aValue
params.description: The new value to assign

params.name: rowIndex
params.description: The row index

params.name: columnIndex
params.description: The column index

methods.description: Sets the value in the cell at the specified position.

methods.name: addTableModelListener

params.name: l
params.description: The TableModelListener to add

methods.description: Adds a listener to the list that is notified each time a change to the data model occurs.

methods.name: removeTableModelListener

params.name: l
params.description: The TableModelListener to remove

methods.description: Removes a listener from the list that is notified each time a change to the data model occurs.

classes.name: TableCellRenderer
classes.description: An interface that defines the method required by any object that would like to be a renderer for cells in a JTable. Commonly implemented in Ignition Vision scripts for custom Power Table cell rendering.

methods.name: getTableCellRendererComponent
methods.signature: getTableCellRendererComponent(table, value, isSelected, hasFocus, row, column)

params.name: table
params.description: The JTable that is asking the renderer to draw

params.name: value
params.description: The value of the cell to be rendered

params.name: isSelected
params.description: True if the cell is selected

params.name: hasFocus
params.description: True if the cell has focus

params.name: row
params.description: The row index of the cell being drawn

params.name: column
params.description: The column index of the cell being drawn

returns.description: The component used for drawing the cell

methods.description: Returns the component used for drawing the cell. This method is used to configure the renderer appropriately before drawing.

classes.name: DefaultTableCellRenderer
classes.description: The standard class for rendering (displaying) individual cells in a JTable. Extends JLabel, so it supports text, icons, and formatting. Commonly subclassed in Ignition Vision scripts to customize Power Table cell appearance.

constructors.description: Creates a default table cell renderer with no icon, left-aligned text, and opaque background.

methods.name: getTableCellRendererComponent
methods.signature: getTableCellRendererComponent(table, value, isSelected, hasFocus, row, column)

params.name: table
params.description: The JTable that is asking the renderer to draw

params.name: value
params.description: The value of the cell to be rendered

params.name: isSelected
params.description: True if the cell is selected

params.name: hasFocus
params.description: True if the cell has focus

params.name: row
params.description: The row index of the cell being drawn

params.name: column
params.description: The column index of the cell being drawn

returns.description: This renderer component configured for the specified cell

methods.description: Returns this renderer configured for the specified cell. Sets the text, colors, and font based on the table and selection state.

methods.name: setValue

params.name: value
params.description: The value to set as the cell's display text (converted via toString)

methods.description: Sets the string value for this cell renderer. Calls setText with the string representation of the value.

methods.name: setForeground

params.name: c
params.description: The foreground color to set

methods.description: Overrides JComponent.setForeground to assign the unselected-foreground color.

methods.name: setBackground

params.name: c
params.description: The background color to set

methods.description: Overrides JComponent.setBackground to assign the unselected-background color.

methods.name: setFont

params.name: font
params.description: The font to use for rendering text

methods.description: Sets the font for this component. Inherited from JLabel.

methods.name: setHorizontalAlignment

params.name: alignment
params.description: One of SwingConstants: LEFT, CENTER, RIGHT, LEADING, or TRAILING

methods.description: Sets the alignment of the renderer's contents along the X axis. Inherited from JLabel.

methods.name: setOpaque

params.name: isOpaque
params.description: True if this component should be opaque

methods.description: Sets whether this component is opaque. An opaque component paints its entire background.

methods.name: setText

params.name: text
params.description: The text to display

methods.description: Sets the text displayed by this renderer. Inherited from JLabel. Supports HTML via '<html>' prefix.
